text: Nizhniye Usly () is a rural locality (a selo) in Uslinsky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 444 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 30 km from Sterlitamak, 2 km from Verkhniye Usly. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Nizhniye Usly
